title: Rasayana Raw Food Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar
description: Raw food restaurant cafe that's all vegan except for honey in a few desserts and drinks. Has wheatgrass juice and other freshly pressed juices. Last order is 8pm. Direction: take SkyTrain to Phrom Phong (Emporium), get a taxi, or walk (15 minutes) on right side of soi 39 (coming from Sukhumvit) for 10 minutes, when reaching Soi PhromMit turn right, walk for some minutes in Soi PhromMit until you reach a restaurant on your left-hand side, when reaching this restaurant turn left into the subsoi and walk for 2 minutes, and Rasayana is on your right.
streetAddress: 57 Soi Sukhumvit 39 (Prom-mitr) Sukhumvit Rd, Klongton-Nua Wattana
